channel.title: Haskell on Marlow's Listener
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on Marlow's Listener

item.title: Combination of k items taken n at a time
item.description: -- combo.hs -- problem: C(k,n), where k = the integers from 1 to 9, inclusive -- and n = 3, without regard to order, then sum the subsets module Combo where import Data.List combinations 0 lst = [[]] combinations n lst = do (x:xs) <- tails lst rest <- combinations (n-1) xs return $ x : rest result = ( map sum (combinations 3 [1..9]))
